item.title: Instead of Research
item.author: matiasandina@gmail.com (Matias Andina)
item.description: Here’s to the list things you are doing instead of research. I wasted some time by organizing the categories into logical clusters of endless misery. I wasted some more time finding people who agree with my complains. Back up. Hard drive space is not enough. Free space in local or personal network is not enough. University sponsored sync program does not sync. New computer, sync between your own files. Re-install life, yes you are going to use custom preferences.
